verses.verse: Now shalt thou gather <S%H1413><s%> thyself in troops <S%H1416><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of troops <S%H1416><s%>: he hath laid <S%H7760><s%> siege <S%H4692><s%> against us <S%H5221><s%>; they shall smite the judge <S%H8199><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with a rod <S%H7626><s%> upon the cheek <S%H3895><s%>.

But thou <S%H1035><s%>, Beth-lehem Ephrathah <S%H672><s%>, which art little <S%H6810><s%> to be among the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, out of thee shall one come forth <S%H3318><s%> unto me that is to be ruler <S%H4910><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>; whose goings forth <S%H4163><s%> are from of old <S%H6924><s%>, from everlasting <S%H3117><s%>.

Therefore will he give them up <S%H5414><s%>, until the time <S%H6256><s%> that she who travaileth <S%H3205><s%> hath brought forth <S%H3205><s%>: then the residue <S%H3499><s%> of his brethren <S%H251><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And he shall stand <S%H5975><s%>, and shall feed <S%H7462><s%> his flock in the strength <S%H5797><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in the majesty <S%H1347><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%>: and they shall abide <S%H3427><s%>; for now shall he be great <S%H1431><s%> unto the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And this man shall be our peace <S%H7965><s%>. When the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> into our land <S%H776><s%>, and when he shall tread <S%H1869><s%> in our palaces <S%H759><s%>, then shall we raise <S%H6965><s%> against him seven <S%H7651><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%>, and eight <S%H8083><s%> principal <S%H5257><s%> men <S%H120><s%>.

And they shall waste <S%H7462><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of Nimrod <S%H5248><s%> in the entrances <S%H6607><s%> thereof <S%H5337><s%>: and he shall deliver us from the Assyrian <S%H804><s%>, when he cometh <S%H935><s%> into our land <S%H776><s%>, and when he treadeth <S%H1869><s%> within our border <S%H1366><s%>.

And the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> as dew <S%H2919><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, as showers <S%H7241><s%> upon the grass <S%H6212><s%>, that tarry <S%H6960><s%> not for man <S%H376><s%>, nor wait <S%H3176><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.

And the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall be among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%>, as a lion <S%H738><s%> among the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%>, as a young lion <S%H3715><s%> among the flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%>; who <S%H5674><s%>, if he go through, treadeth down <S%H7429><s%> and teareth in pieces <S%H2963><s%>, and there is none to deliver <S%H5337><s%>.
Let thy hand <S%H3027><s%> be lifted up <S%H7311><s%> above thine adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, and let all thine enemies <S%H341><s%> be cut off <S%H3772><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> thy horses <S%H5483><s%> out of the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee <S%H6><s%>, and will destroy thy chariots <S%H4818><s%>:
and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the cities <S%H6145><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%>, and will throw down <S%H2040><s%> all thy strongholds <S%H4013><s%>.
And I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> witchcrafts <S%H3785><s%> out of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>; and thou shalt have no more soothsayers <S%H6049><s%>:

and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> thy graven images <S%H6456><s%> and thy pillars <S%H4676><s%> out of the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee <S%H7812><s%>; and thou shalt no more worship the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hands <S%H3027><s%>;
and I will pluck up <S%H5428><s%> thine Asherim <S%H842><s%> out of the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee <S%H8045><s%>; and I will destroy thy cities <S%H6145><s%>.
And I will execute <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> in anger <S%H639><s%> and wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon the nations <S%H1471><s%> which hearkened not <S%H8085><s%>.
